keyAPIs: openGraph, twitter, appLinks, appleWebApp, itunes properties
constraints: metadata must be exported from layout.tsx or page.tsx
generateMetadata is async and receives params/searchParams
headers() and cookies() are read-only in Server Components

Icons referenced in manifest must exist in public folder

Select.Value should not be styled for correct positioning
